content: Make your way straight up from the Valley Entrance Keeper's Shrine. As you progress along this small pathway, you'll encounter Scorching-Fire enemies, similar to the Searing-Fire ones. These will attempt to hide along the path, so be prepared for them to jump out at you.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Furnace_Valley_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Furnace Valley Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Valley Entrance'.
The content is as follows:
Make your way straight up from the Valley Entrance Keeper's Shrine. As you progress along this small pathway, you'll encounter Scorching-Fire enemies, similar to the Searing-Fire ones. These will attempt to hide along the path, so be prepared for them to jump out at you.
